description:
Realistic and hardcore drone simulator will give you emotions and control experience. In the game you will be able to improve your skills in aerobatics, which you have to show by passing difficult routes for a limited time, which is becoming more and more accurate with each level.
There are several drones to choose from, each of which is distinguished by the speed and complexity of control, all you can find in the store.
After mastering the latest and most difficult drone to fly, try to perform all possible tricks and maneuvers with it in free mode.

Features:
- Realistic physics 
- Numerous selection of drones 
- Lots of levels 
- Beautiful graphics
name: Drone Race Simulator Pilot Flight School Airplane Games Jet 2023
